abstract: American officials say most military advisers being sent to Uganda to help track down brutal guerrilla group Lord's Resistance Army will stay in Uganda, which group has not attacked in years.
snippet: Most of the military advisers being sent to Uganda to help hunt down the Lord’s Resistance Army, a guerrilla group in central Africa, will stay in Uganda, which the group has not attacked in years.

lead_paragraph: Most of the military advisers being sent to Uganda to help hunt down the Lord’s Resistance Army, a guerrilla group in central Africa, will stay in Uganda, which the group has not attacked in years.

headline.main: No Combat Role for U.S. Advisers in Uganda, Official Says
headline.print_headline: U.S. Advisers Will Stay Within Uganda
